description: Submission of a school travel plan in pursuant to condition 12 of planning permission ref: 223081VAR dated 22.12.2022 for 'Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition 6  (approved plans)and condition 10 (Car Park) pursuant to planning permission reference PP/2013/3491 21/10/2013 for " Erection of single storey extension with canopies to rear (East) to provide additional classrooms, hall, swimming pool and associated accommodation, canopy extension to North West side of main building  and 5 small ancillary buildings , external alterations to part of existing building, formation of staff car parking area (22 spaces, 2 of which are disabled) at East end of site with access off Vallis Way, alterations and use of existing parking area to provide 20 mini bus parking spaces, provision of hard surfaced play areas and soft landscaping (Deemed Consent)" Variation seeks to remove condition 6 or amended to allow for use of the rear car park 7 days per week and by non school users.
